title: We Gotta Go Back in Time with Pokemon Legends Arceus
description:
Wondering what's next for the Pokemon franchise? Just how many games could they put out that are basically the same thing? Well, we finally have something pretty dramatically different! The gang dives into Pokemon Legends: Arceus and whether this is finally the game to recommend to newcomers to the franchise. 

Also discussed: Vampire Survivors, Station Eleven and, yes, Roblox.
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (Chris Plante, Russ Frushtick, Griffin McElroy, Justin McElroy)
